Firehouse Pizza Shop II.text: It's decent pizza. Fluffy crust. Staff was friendly enough. I'll definitely go again but I'll have to be in the mood for fluffy crust

Firehouse Pizza Shop II.text: Order a medium steak cheese and mushrooms. As well as a medium Italian. I ate the steak. Was very good. My boyfriend ate the Italian, which he also liked. There is inside seating which we didn’t use. Opted to go home. Food was still hot when got home. Prices were fair.
Firehouse Pizza Shop II.author: Jodi Marchuk
Firehouse Pizza Shop II.full_text: Order a medium steak cheese and mushrooms. As well as a medium Italian. I ate the steak. Was very good. My boyfriend ate the Italian, which he also liked. There is inside seating which we didn’t use. Opted to go home. Food was still hot when got home. Prices were fair.

Bellingham Palace.text: I have been coming here for years the food is always wonderful! Although my palate has changed since being a child and ordering chocolate chip pancakes. Today we ordered the Irish Benedict and the chicken and waffles both dishes were phenomenal!! Our server was so friendly and attentive. She even had the kitchen divide each order in to 2 plates so we were able to sample. That was such a great idea.
Bellingham Palace.author: Joy Young
Bellingham Palace.full_text: I have been coming here for years the food is always wonderful! Although my palate has changed since being a child and ordering chocolate chip pancakes. Today we ordered the Irish Benedict and the chicken and waffles both dishes were phenomenal!! Our server was so friendly and attentive. She even had the kitchen divide each order in to 2 plates so we were able to sample. That was such a great idea.

Bellingham Palace.text: Always a comfortable setting the staff if always sweet and attentive. The food is great classic American breakfast, great lunch and dinner (italian,american,comfort) of and may I just brag about there chicken and waffles the best!
Bellingham Palace.author: Amy Chounlamany
Bellingham Palace.full_text: Always a comfortable setting the staff if always sweet and attentive. The food is great classic American breakfast, great lunch and dinner (italian,american,comfort) of and may I just brag about there chicken and waffles the best!

Bellingham Palace.text: When I opened my plate I said wt* is this! I ordered stuffed French toast which was made with grinder bread 😳 This had to be 6”thick. Like how can anyone eat that. No strawberries inside but they gave me a freezing cold size of strawberries in juice (not sweetened). This was $15. My husbands bacon also looked shredded and fatty. I wanted regular breakfast with beans but saw that a side of beans is $6.29! You can make a 5 quart pot for that price.
Bellingham Palace.author: jennifer sanchez
Bellingham Palace.full_text: When I opened my plate I said wt* is this! I ordered stuffed French toast which was made with grinder bread 😳 This had to be 6”thick. Like how can anyone eat that. No strawberries inside but they gave me a freezing cold size of strawberries in juice (not sweetened). This was $15. My husbands bacon also looked shredded and fatty. I wanted regular breakfast with beans but saw that a side of beans is $6.29! You can make a 5 quart pot for that price.

Bellingham Palace.text: Used to be great, but honestly the quality of the food as well as the service has gone downhill.  Service used to be friendly, cheerful, now ya barely get a smile from these waitresses.  Had to ask for splenda three times before it finally arrived. And the steak in the steak omelet reminded me of those steakum type things from the freezer section.  Definitely not worth the $20+ that that build your own omelet ended up costing.  Oh, and the prices have gone up drastically too.
Bellingham Palace.author: Dee Malle

Bellingham Palace.text:
Second time coming to this place and haven't been disappointed.

My girlfriend ordered the steak and eggs with a strawberry mimosa and I had coffee with the Philly cheese steak breakfast.

I must say it was quire enjoyable.
Bellingham Palace.author: Josh Erwin
Bellingham Palace.full_text:
Second time coming to this place and haven't been disappointed.

My girlfriend ordered the steak and eggs with a strawberry mimosa and I had coffee with the Philly cheese steak breakfast.

I must say it was quire enjoyable.

Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.text: Ordered a meatball sub and like everything today we’re not getting whole meatballs on today’s economy…that being said…everything from the bread to the peppers was very fresh. Made unique; seasoned excellently. The meatballs were tender, I don’t know if made in house but whatever was done was fantastic.
Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.author: Jarett Palermo

Made unique; seasoned excellently. The meatballs were tender, I don’t know if made in house but whatever was done was fantastic.

Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.text:
If your gonna mail me your menu and if I want to order from your restaurant- make sure your professionalism and your willingness to provide the delivery is available ! Stop sending me your menus because not even given the chance to order from your place and getting a bad review.

BAD HIT

Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.text: Without a foubtthe best pizza I have had in my 30 years of living. The perfect balance between sauce and cheese. And when it comes to the taste... Second to none. Well done to the chef!
Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.author: John O.
Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.full_text: Without a foubtthe best pizza I have had in my 30 years of living. The perfect balance between sauce and cheese. And when it comes to the taste... Second to none. Well done to the chef!

Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.text:
First time ordering from this establishment.
The people here are pleasant and professional from ordering via phone to picking up.
The pizza had ample cheese (about time I find a place that does that)...my only suggestion, not complaint, is to cook the pizza a smidgen more.
Though tasty, bottom needs to brown and crust, little more crusty.
All in all, good job guys and best of luck.
Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.author: Ken Kay
Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill.full_text:
First time ordering from this establishment.
The people here are pleasant and professional from ordering via phone to picking up.
The pizza had ample cheese (about time I find a place that does that)...my only suggestion, not complaint, is to cook the pizza a smidgen more.
Though tasty, bottom needs to brown and crust, little more crusty.
All in all, good job guys and best of luck.

Supreme Pizza.text: Not sure what’s going on lately, but they can’t seem to get the orders right. Paid for extra ranch on my BBQ chicken, bacon ranch pizza and got zero ranch but extra cheese. Today I asked for my steak and cheese sub to be extra toasted and it wasn’t toasted at all. Always order online so I know they see what I ordered. Starting to think twice about this place. It’s not what it used to be!
Supreme Pizza.author: Nichole Jarrie
Supreme Pizza.full_text: Not sure what’s going on lately, but they can’t seem to get the orders right. Paid for extra ranch on my BBQ chicken, bacon ranch pizza and got zero ranch but extra cheese. Today I asked for my steak and cheese sub to be extra toasted and it wasn’t toasted at all. Always order online so I know they see what I ordered. Starting to think twice about this place. It’s not what it used to be!

Supreme Pizza.text: The girls who take my order over the phone have me repeating everything, like theyre drifting off into space. Food is awesome, service not so much. It’s funny when the male employee takes the order much better over the phone.
Supreme Pizza.author: Mary Moomi
Supreme Pizza.full_text: The girls who take my order over the phone have me repeating everything, like theyre drifting off into space. Food is awesome, service not so much. It’s funny when the male employee takes the order much better over the phone.

Supreme Pizza.text: Oh first time we came here we was driving by and we found a place the boneless buffalo chicken perfect very juicy the french fries super good and crispy and the chicken cutlet. Awesome. I would recommend this place to everybody good customer service very clean, very friendly.Nick  was super excellent service 10+
Supreme Pizza.author: evy Rosado

Awesome. I would recommend this place to everybody good customer service very clean, very friendly.Nick  was super excellent service 10+

Supreme Pizza.text: I just moved down the street from this pizzeria, and I thought I would give it a try. The pizza was excellent and wasn't the least bit greasy. Family of 4 and it was a good size. Very clean establishment plenty of parking .
Supreme Pizza.author: Holly Magera
Supreme Pizza.full_text: I just moved down the street from this pizzeria, and I thought I would give it a try. The pizza was excellent and wasn't the least bit greasy. Family of 4 and it was a good size. Very clean establishment plenty of parking .

Supreme Pizza.text: Delivery takes a ridiculously long time. I ordered pizza from here twice between March and April 2025. First time, I placed an order at 3:45 on a weekday, pizza wasn't delivered until 5:15. Second time, similar - ordered at 4;00 didn't receive pizza until 5:30. I'm only a 5 minute drive away from them! They skimp on the sauce and toppings. Cheese was heavy and "gloopy." Both times, pizza was barely warm, bordering on being cold. I'm not ordering from here again and I don't recommend ordering from them.
Supreme Pizza.author: Ms Teri
Supreme Pizza.full_text: Delivery takes a ridiculously long time. I ordered pizza from here twice between March and April 2025. First time, I placed an order at 3:45 on a weekday, pizza wasn't delivered until 5:15. Second time, similar - ordered at 4;00 didn't receive pizza until 5:30. I'm only a 5 minute drive away from them! They skimp on the sauce and toppings. Cheese was heavy and "gloopy." Both times, pizza was barely warm, bordering on being cold. I'm not ordering from here again and I don't recommend ordering from them.
